title: Instructional Design Workshop for Learning Objective Design and Experimental Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing project-based assessment and collaboration tools in BYOD environments for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Design learning objectives using a three-stage checklist that evaluates clarity, measurability, and achievability.
Complete a research project analyzing the impact of learning objective types on learner outcomes by applying experimental design methodologies.
Improve the learning objective achievement evaluation process by establishing a learner-centered feedback system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
